original_text: Instead, they were arguing with Paul about what the Jews teach about God. They were arguing about a man who is called Jesus. Jesus had died. But Paul was saying that he is alive.
korean_text: 오직 자기들의 종교와 또는 예수라 하는 이가 죽은 것을 살아 있다고 바울이 주장하는 그 일에 관한 문제로 고발하는 것뿐이라

sentences.original_text: Instead, they were arguing with Paul
about what the Jews teach about God
sentences.korean_translation: 유대인들이 하나님에 대해 가르치는 것에 대하여

sentences.original_text: They were arguing about a man
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 한 사람에 대해 논쟁하고 있었습니다
